stochastic_function: lambda investment_decision, current_savings, market_risk, economic_conditions: {1:0.0,0:0.95,-1:0.05} if investment_decision == 'do not invest' else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2} if current_savings ==1 and market_risk ==1 and economic_conditions ==1 else {1:0.1,0:0.6,-1:0.3} if current_savings ==1 and market_risk ==1 and economic_conditions ==0 else {1:0.2,0:0.5,-1:0.3} if current_savings ==1 and market_risk ==0 and economic_conditions ==1 else {1:0.15,0:0.6,-1:0.25} if current_savings ==0 and market_risk ==1 and economic_conditions ==1 else {1:0.1,0:0.7,-1:0.2} if current_savings ==0 and market_risk ==0 and economic_conditions ==0 else {1:0.05,0:0.75,-1:0.2} if (current_savings,market_risk,economic_conditions).count(-1) ==1 else {1:0.0,0:0.8,-1:0.2} if (current_savings,market_risk,economic_conditions).count(-1) >=2 else {1:0.1,0:0.65,-1:0.25}
